title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: If the key is left blank in the properties file, but has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
EB: Currently, when the key is blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the properties file
2. Leave the key blank, but assign a valid value
3. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title
